string-array.name: contact_messages
string-array.item: If I fall, don\'t bring me back.
Anha vazhak maan rek me zala.
No one will take my dragons.
When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die.
That\'s what I do: I drink and I know things.
There is no honor in tricks.
Chaos isn\'t a pit. Chaos is a ladder.
A girl is Arya Stark of Winterfell. And I\'m going home.
I want to be the queen.
I trust all my men. Just as far as I can spit.
For the night is dark and full of terrors.
The things I do for love.
A good act does not wash out the bad, nor a bad the good.
The night is dark and full of terrors.

string-array.name: jon_snow_chat
string-array.item: I don\'t even know who my mother was
Some woman, no doubt. Most of them are. He favored Jon with a rueful grin. Remember this, boy. All dwarfs may be bastards, yet not all bastards need be dwarfs
Kill the boy, Jon Snow. Winter is almost upon us. Kill the boy and let the man be born.
The only time a man can be brave is when he is afraid.
